event.event-label: ABBCS-defined node event: ABBCS nodeLostService: SWAP
event.descr:
A %service% error was identified on %nodelabel% because of the following condition: %parm[eventReason]%.

A new Outage record has been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
event.logmsg: %service% outage identified on interface %interface%.

event.event-label: User-defined HIGH threshold event exceeded: uei.opennms.org/ABBCS/JVM-highmem-trigger
event.descr:
High threshold exceeded for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%

By default, OpenNMS watches some key parameters on devices in your network and will alert you with an event if certain conditions arise. For example, if the CPU utilization on your Cisco router maintains an inordinately high percentage of utilization for an extended period, an event will be generated. These thresholds are determined and configured based on vendor recommendations, tempered with real-world experience in working deployments.

This specific event indicates that a high threshold was exceeded.
event.logmsg: High threshold exceeded for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%

event.event-label: User-defined HIGH threshold event rearmed: uei.opennms.org/ABBCS/JVM-highmem-rearm
event.descr:
High threshold has been rearmed for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%

By default, OpenNMS watches some key parameters on devices in your network and will alert you with an event if certain conditions arise. For example, if the CPU utilization on your Cisco router maintains an inordinately high percentage of utilization for an extended period, an event will be generated. These thresholds are determined and configured based on vendor recommendations, tempered with real-world experience in working deployments.

This specific event indicates that a high threshold was exceeded but then dropped below the rearm threshold..
event.logmsg: High threshold rearmed for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%

event.descr:
High threshold exceeded for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%

event.logmsg: High threshold exceeded for %service% datasource %parm[ds]% on interface %interface%, parms: %parm[all]%
